q: " It wasn't about putting lipstick on a pig, said Jackson. "It was to transform the pig into a handsome prince. And they did it!" The transformation, he said, took an attention to detail on the engineering side that you can't fake. I have nothing but admiration for Sergio Marchionne for unleashing it, and for his team for executing it. Indeed, nobody, except maybe Sergio Marchionne himself, believed Chrysler could redo its product line so dramatically in 18 months. "They just accomplished a tremendous amount of work in a short time, and with

State of the Union edition time pubdate datetime= "2011-01-27T17:14:24-05:00"> Mike Pence won't run for president, but will likely run for IN governor Indianapolis Star on the news that will disappoint some national conservatives: U.S. Rep. Mike Pence shut the door today on a run for the presidency, but left wide open the likelihood that he'll seek a different office: Governor of Indiana. "In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana," Mike Pence , R-Columbus, said of himself and wife Karen in a letter being sent to supporters. Bernie Sanders Welch to get the appropriate waivers and flexibility for us to go forward toward a single-payer system." Welch said, When Vermont innovates, the nation often follows our lead. Providing Vermont and other states with the flexibility to build upon health care reform will result in better care and greater access at a lower cost. Allowing us to become a laboratory for innovation and excellence will help Vermonters, while once again allowing us to lead the way. Patrick Leahy said, "While some in Washington are trying to turn the clock back on health reform, Vermont instead is moving forward.
